sentences.sContent: The Topmost Degree of the Human Nature——A study of Maslow's theory of self-realization;
sentences.sContent_eng: The Topmost Degree of the Human Nature——A study of Maslow's theory of self-realization;
sentences.sCn: 巴金的每一次成功的创作都是一次自我实现的历程。

sentences.sContent: Freedom, as a highest performance of life significance, means self-realization and self-surpass of life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Freedom, as a highest performance of life significance, means self-realization and self-surpass of life.
sentences.sCn: 自由作为人生意义的最高体现，意味着生命的自我实现和自我超越。

sentences.sContent: The differences between the human brain and the body make peoples needs to show diversities and foresights and have the contradictions between the needs and the ability of self-realization.
sentences.sContent_eng: The differences between the human brain and the body make peoples needs to show diversities and foresights and have the contradictions between the needs and the ability of self-realization.
sentences.sCn: 人脑与人的肢体的差异以及进化的不同步性，使人类在自身过程中出现了这样一对矛盾：需求多样性、前瞻性与人自我靠肢体能力实现其需求之间不同步； 工具与社会的产生是人类计算的结果。

trans.tranCn: 自我实现， 自我完成
trans.tranOther: the realization or fulfilment of one's own potential or abilities
